quest.name: A Harey Situation
journal: Thancred's dumbfounded expression suggests he is still struggling to comprehend the spectacle he has just witnessed.
objectives: Speak with the snappy Loporrit again.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: Given the present crisis, Hydaelyn doubtless sought to facilitate cooperation betwixt pilot and passenger...

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: Indeed, 'twould require a heart as hard as diamond to raise one's voice in anger to beings possessed of such profound...saccharinity.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: I find Urianger's reasoning somewhat flimsy, but the crew seems amicable enough.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: They must be the Loporrits mentioned in the watcher's records.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Not at all what I expected. But the watcher did bid us heed their counsel...

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: I assume the one who gave that rousing speech was their leader, though we might have to ask about in order to track them down. Come on then, let us be about it.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: I only saw them from a distance, but their fur was brown if that helps at all.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: The Loporrits all appear to have set about their tasks. Whither is their leader, I wonder?

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Such a fascinating apparatus, though it's hard to believe it could house so many crew members. Even so, there is nothing else here to suggest other types of accommodation.

dialogue.name: SINGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Hum hum-hummm～♪

dialogue.name: SINGINGWAY
dialogue.text: (-Singingway-)The leader of the crew? Not me, I'm afraid. Singingway's the name!

dialogue.name: SINGINGWAY
dialogue.text: (-Singingway-)I'm in charge of the construction and maintenance of the atmospheric circulation system. Only the crispest, cleanest air for the people of Etheirys─and that's a promise!

dialogue.name: SLEEPINGWAY
dialogue.text: Mlem mlem mlem... Leader...? No...

dialogue.name: SLEEPINGWAY
dialogue.text: (-Sleepingway-)Sleepingway... My job is...is... Hmm. Perhaps I'd better ask...

dialogue.name: LIVINGWAY
dialogue.text: Wh-What!? How in the─!?

dialogue.name: LIVINGWAY
dialogue.text: When did you get here? Who let you in? Why wasn't I told!?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Take me to your leader.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Were you the one giving orders earlier?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Hum hum-hummm～♪

dialogue.name: LIVINGWAY
dialogue.text: Leader? Ah, yes─ahem! Look no further─I am the one you seek.

dialogue.name: LIVINGWAY
dialogue.text: Me? Oh, yes─of course! As the only one around here capable of doing anything properly, it falls to me to take charge of the others.

dialogue.name: LIVINGWAY
dialogue.text: ...What was that supposed to be? Your humming─if one can even call it that─is atrociously off-key! It should sound more like this!

dialogue.name: LIVINGWAY
dialogue.text: As leader of the Loporrits, I cannot allow substandard attempts at musicality to go unremarked, even if you are a guest. But being the magnanimous sort that I am, I'll forgive you this once.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Well, well. Looks like you beat us here.

dialogue.name: LIVINGWAY
dialogue.text: Your friends, I take it. Is this all of them?

dialogue.name: LIVINGWAY
dialogue.text: A group comprised entirely of children? What must their parents be thinking?

dialogue.name: LIVINGWAY
dialogue.text: This isn't a nursery, after all. Though perhaps we should build one. Or did we build one already?

dialogue.name: LIVINGWAY
dialogue.text: No matter. You needn't worry your pretty little heads. All will be well, I promise.

dialogue.name: LIVINGWAY
dialogue.text: But goodness me, we shouldn't be standing about gawping. I must take you to meet the others.

dialogue.name: LIVINGWAY
dialogue.text: If you could run along back toward the entrance, you'll find a path that leads to the central platform on the upper floor.

dialogue.name: LIVINGWAY
dialogue.text: There's no wrong way to reach it, but it's the large, glowing ball at the center, if you should find yourselves lost.

dialogue.name: LIVINGWAY
dialogue.text: I shall gather the others and meet you there.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Well, then. Back to the upper floor it is.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Given their size, getting from one end of this place to the other must be exhausting. I honestly don't know how they do it.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: 'Tis astounding how the Loporrits─despite their diminutive stature─are able to maintain such gargantuan facilities.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: The aetheric composition and density of this sphere is quite similar to the crystalline concepts we've seen before. It likely shares their capacity for storing memories and knowledge.

dialogue.name: MAPPINGWAY
dialogue.text: Visitors, at last. Welcome!
